articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 139 days: 3 Scottish brothers set a record for fastest row across the Pacific - NPR
articles.description: Jamie, Ewan and Lachlan Maclean completed the fastest unsupported row across the Pacific, arriving in Cairns, Australia, on Saturday. They rowed over 9,000 miles non-stop from Peru.
articles.content:
Three Scottish brothers set a world record Saturday for completing the fastest unsupported row across the full Pacific Ocean.
Jamie, Ewan and Lachlan Maclean completed the journey in 139 days, arriv… [+1551 chars]
